translations: n.钟摆，摆锤；（局势意见等的）摇摆不定，变化不定

sentences.sentence: “We have here the mother of all pendulums!
We have here in 26-100 the mother of all pendulums.
sentences.translation: 在这里0，有所有钟摆之母。

sentences.sentence: They also have to swing like pendulums and jump like pogo sticks.
sentences.translation: 它们还会像钟摆一样摇摆，像孩子们玩得弹簧单高跷一样跳跃。
